alert.note: Alert for Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL PASSAIC...NORTHWESTERN BERGEN...NORTH CENTRAL ESSEX AND ROCKLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pompton Lakes, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paterson, Wayne, Ramsey, Ringwood, Pompton Lakes, Suffern, Sloatsburg, Hawthorne, Bloomingdale, Fairfield, Montclair, Wyckoff, Little Falls, Verona, and Oakland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northeastern New Jersey...and southeastern New York.
